thread.title: Monolithic Power Systems Q1 Non-GAAP Earnings Per Share $0.79

author: Reuters Editorial
title: Monolithic Power Systems Q1 Non-GAAP Earnings Per Share $0.79
text:
April 30, 2018 / 8:30 PM / Updated 2 minutes ago BRIEF-Monolithic Power Systems Q1 Non-GAAP Earnings Per Share $0.79 Reuters Staff
April 30 (Reuters) - Monolithic Power Systems Inc:
* MONOLITHIC POWER SYSTEMS ANNOUNCES RESULTS FOR THE FIRST QUARTER ENDED MARCH 31, 2018
* Q1 NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.79 EXCLUDING ITEMS * Q1 GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.49
* Q1 REVENUE $129.2 MILLION VERSUS I/B/E/S VIEW $125.2 MILLION
* Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.77 â€” THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S * SEES Q2 2018 REVENUE $135 MILLION TO $141 MILLION
* SEES Q2 GAAP GROSS MARGIN BETWEEN 54.9% AND 55.9% Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
